mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (r_id, p_id, r_content, r_credate, r_moddate, r_status) values (SEQUENCE_REPLY.nextval, #{p_id}, #{r_content}, sysdate, sysdate, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT reply.* , member.m_image , member.m_nname FROM reply FULL OUTER JOIN member ON reply.m_id = member.m_id WHERE reply.r_id = #{r_id}
select r_id, p_id, r_content, m_id, r_credate, r_moddate from reply where p_id = #{p_id} order by r_id asc
SELECT M_ID from MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
